category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Use cases
result.description: Identification of the most urgent needs in autonomous living, socialisation and mobility of older adults with cognitive impairments but also of carers. Also, an analysis of the available services in each pilot site will be realised, followed by the preliminary selection of services to be offered during WP7 pilots and their improvement and integration in WPs 3-7. Finally, the project use cases will be extracted.

result.title: Basic InnoCreate Platform in place
result.description: The InnoCreate concept is based on connecting creative SMEs with key ecosystems to support their growth. Rather than invest resources in establishing a new platform which will be unsustainable after the end of the project, WP3 plans to develop the InnoCreate Online Support Centre as an integral and sustainable part of the European Creative Business Network (ECB Network) and EBN web platforms.
